configItem.name: genius
configItem.description: Genius Comfy KB-16M / Genius MM Keyboard KWD-910

configItem.name: logitech_g15
configItem.description: Logitech G15 extra keys via G15daemon

configItem.name: logiinkse
configItem.description: Logitech iTouch Internet Navigator Keyboard SE

configItem.name: logiinkseusb
configItem.description: Logitech iTouch Internet Navigator Keyboard SE (USB)

configItem.name: logiultraxc
configItem.description: Logitech Ultra-X Cordless Media Desktop Keyboard

configItem.name: microsoftpro
configItem.description: Microsoft Natural Keyboard Pro / Microsoft Internet Keyboard Pro

configItem.name: microsoftprousb
configItem.description: Microsoft Natural Keyboard Pro USB / Microsoft Internet Keyboard Pro

configItem.name: bepo_latin9
configItem.description: Bepo, ergonomic, Dvorak way, latin-9 only

configItem.name: ro_nodeadkeys
configItem.description: Romanian keyboard with German letters, eliminate dead keys

configItem.name: dvorak_quotes
configItem.description: Dvorak, Polish quotes on quotemark key

configItem.name: grp:lswitch
configItem.description: Left Alt key switches layout while pressed.

configItem.name: grp:lwin_switch
configItem.description: Left Win-key switches layout while pressed.

configItem.name: grp:rwin_switch
configItem.description: Right Win-key switches layout while pressed.

configItem.name: grp:win_switch
configItem.description: Both Win-keys switch layout while pressed.

configItem.name: grp:rctrl_switch
configItem.description: Right Ctrl key switches layout while pressed.

configItem.name: grp:shifts_toggle
configItem.description: Both Shift keys together change layout.

configItem.name: lv3:switch
configItem.description: Press Right Ctrl to choose 3rd level.

configItem.name: lv3:menu_switch
configItem.description: Press Menu key to choose 3rd level.

configItem.name: lv3:win_switch
configItem.description: Press any of Win-keys to choose 3rd level.

configItem.name: lv3:lwin_switch
configItem.description: Press Left Win-key to choose 3rd level.

configItem.name: lv3:rwin_switch
configItem.description: Press Right Win-key to choose 3rd level.

configItem.name: lv3:alt_switch
configItem.description: Press any of Alt keys to choose 3rd level.

configItem.name: lv3:lalt_switch
configItem.description: Press Left Alt key to choose 3rd level.

configItem.name: lv3:ralt_switch
configItem.description: Press Right Alt key to choose 3rd level.

configItem.name: lv3:ralt_switch_multikey
configItem.description: Press Right Alt key to choose 3rd level, Shift+Right Alt key is Multi_Key.

configItem.name: lv3:ralt_alt
configItem.description: Right Alt key never chooses 3rd level.

configItem.name: ctrl:ctrl_ra
configItem.description: Right Ctrl key works as Right Alt.

configItem.name: grp_led
configItem.description: Use keyboard LED to show alternative layout.

configItem.name: keypad:oss
configItem.description: Keypad with unicode additions (arrows and math operators)

configItem.name: keypad:future
configItem.description: Keypad with unicode additions (arrows and math operators). Math operators on default level.

configItem.name: keypad:oss_wang
configItem.description: Wang 724 keypad with unicode additions (arrows and math operators)

configItem.name: keypad:future_wang
configItem.description: Wang 724 keypad with unicode additions (arrows and math operators). Math operators on default level.

configItem.name: caps:internal
configItem.description: CapsLock uses internal capitalization. Shift "pauses" CapsLock.

configItem.name: caps:internal_nocancel
configItem.description: CapsLock uses internal capitalization. Shift doesn't affect CapsLock.

configItem.name: caps:shift
configItem.description: CapsLock acts as Shift with locking. Shift "pauses" CapsLock.

configItem.name: caps:shift_nocancel
configItem.description: CapsLock acts as Shift with locking. Shift doesn't affect CapsLock.

configItem.name: caps:shift_lock
configItem.description: CapsLock just locks the Shift modifier.

configItem.name: caps:capslock
configItem.description: CapsLock toggles normal capitalization of alphabetic characters.

configItem.name: caps:shiftlock
configItem.description: CapsLock toggles Shift so all keys are affected.

configItem.name: altwin:menu
configItem.description: Add the standard behavior to Menu key.

configItem.name: altwin:meta_alt
configItem.description: Alt and Meta are on the Alt keys.

configItem.name: altwin:ctrl_win
configItem.description: Control is mapped to the Win-keys (and the usual Ctrl keys).

configItem.name: altwin:meta_win
configItem.description: Meta is mapped to the Win-keys.

configItem.name: altwin:left_meta_win
configItem.description: Meta is mapped to the left Win-key.

configItem.name: altwin:super_win
configItem.description: Super is mapped to the Win-keys.

configItem.name: altwin:hyper_win
configItem.description: Hyper is mapped to the Win-keys.

configItem.name: altwin:alt_super_win
configItem.description: Alt is mapped to the right Win-key and Super to Menu.

configItem.name: altwin:swap_lalt_lwin
configItem.description: Left Alt is swapped with left Win-key.

configItem.name: numpad:mac
configItem.description: Numeric keypad keys work as with Mac.

configItem.name: numpad:microsoft
configItem.description: Shift with numeric keypad keys works as in MS Windows.

configItem.name: srvrkeys:none
configItem.description: Special keys (Ctrl+Alt+<key>) handled in a server.

configItem.name: apple:badmap
configItem.description: Swap keycodes of two keys when Mac keyboards are misdetected by kernel.

configItem.name: eurosign
configItem.description: Adding the EuroSign to certain keys

configItem.name: eurosign:e
configItem.description: Add the EuroSign to the E key.

configItem.name: eurosign:2
configItem.description: Add the EuroSign to the 2 key.

configItem.name: eurosign:4
configItem.description: Add the EuroSign to the 4 key.

configItem.name: eurosign:5
configItem.description: Add the EuroSign to the 5 key.

configItem.name: nbsp
configItem.description: Using space key to input non-breakable space character

configItem.name: nbsp:none
configItem.description: Space key outputs usual space at any level.

configItem.name: nbsp:level2
configItem.description: Space key outputs non-breakable space character at second level.

configItem.name: nbsp:level3
configItem.description: Space key outputs non-breakable space character at third level.

configItem.name: nbsp:level3s
configItem.description: Space key outputs non-breakable space character at third level, nothing at fourth level.

configItem.name: nbsp:level3n
configItem.description: Space key outputs non-breakable space character at third level, thin non-breakable space character at fourth level

configItem.name: nbsp:level4
configItem.description: Space key outputs non-breakable space character at fourth level.

configItem.name: nbsp:level4n
configItem.description: Space key outputs non-breakable space character at fourth level, thin non-breakable space character at sixth level
